channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Healthcare Runs On Women: Without Flexibility, Can It Keep Up?
item.description: It’s time for healthcare to step up and give women the tools, support and opportunities they need to truly succeed.

item.title: Beyond EUDR Compliance: Supply Chain Visibility Unlocks Advantages
item.description: Leading businesses must understand that comprehensive supply chain visibility can become a powerful source of actionable insights.

item.description: The scale of Google’s update is now confirmed.

item.title: Data Governance: Ensuring Trust, Compliance And Quality At Scale
item.description: In my experience working with data engineering and AI, I’ve come to realize that data governance isn’t just about compliance—it’s about trust.

item.title: Uncomfortable ideas
item.description: The ideas aren’t uncomfortable, we are. You don’t have to like the weather to acknowledge that it’s raining.
